text: INHERITED: INHERITED: INHERITED: * Bernard-Soulier syndrome e Glanzmann’s e Oculocutaneous albinism e Von Willebrand'’s disease thrombasthenia e Chediak-Higashi syndrome (vWD) * Afibrinogenaemia e Isolated dense granule deficiency ACQUIRED: ACQUIRED: e Gray-platelet syndrome e Uraemia e Fibrin degradation product e Acquired VWD inhibition ACQUIRED * Dysproteinaemias e Cardiopulmonary bypass ® Drugs (e.g. ticlopidine, e Myeloproliferative GPIIb/llla inhibitors) disorders e Drugs (aspirin, NSAIDs)
